text: Clàudia Cerdà Cassi (born 6 October 1999) is an Andorran footballer who plays as a midfielder. She has been a member of the Andorra women's national team. ==International career== Cerdà capped for Andorra at senior level during the UEFA Women's Euro 2017 qualifying preliminary round, including the 0–8 loss to the Faroe Islands on 6 April 2015 (biggest defeat in the Andorra women's national football team history). ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Andorran women's footballers Category:Andorra women's international footballers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Clàudia Cerdà
